attributes.action: prevent Waitrose/John Lewis from making an example out of Dean Westwood. Dean Westwood. A man, a soldier and now... a victim
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dean has lost his employment for an action that been executed by many at the establishment- including those in senior positions.
Mr Westwood is being used as an example - Lets right this wrong.

rejection.details: You cannot submit a petition which makes claims about individuals and/or commercial organisations.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Material which is potentially confidential, commercially sensitive, or which may cause personal distress or loss
The names of individual officials of public bodies, unless they are part of the senior management of those organisations
